description: http://anidb.net/ch11298 [Igawa Asagi]`s younger sister. A beautiful girl favoring a winning, vigorous attitude. Much like Asagi, she`s endowed with the strong ability of the ninja from heredity, yet her strength is still much at an apprentice level. She is aspiring to become a http://anidb.net/ch27736 [Taimanin] member, but she keeps her pursuit of knowledge and training hidden from her older sister.
name: Igawa Sakura
